original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Addhānavagga
analyzed: addhā anavagga

original: 6. Nāmarūpaekattanānattapañha
analyzed: nāma rūpa ekatta nānatta pañha

original: Rājā āha—
analyzed: rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, ko paṭisandahatī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ko paṭisandahati iti

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “nāmarūpaṁ kho, mahārāja, paṭisandahatī”ti.
analyzed: nāma rūpam kho mahā rāja paṭisandahati iti

original: “Kiṁ imaṁyeva nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahatī”ti?
analyzed: kim imayā iva nāma rūpam paṭisandahati iti

original: “Na kho, mahārāja, imaṁyeva nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahati, iminā pana, mahārāja, nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, tena kammena aññaṁ nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahatī”ti.
analyzed: na kho mahā rāja imayā iva nāma rūpam paṭisandahati iminā pana mahā rāja nāma rūpena kammam karoti sobhanam vā pāpakam vā tena kammena aññam nāma rūpam paṭisandahati iti

original: “Yadi, bhante, na imaṁ yeva nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahati, nanu so mutto bhavissati pāpakehi kammehī”ti?
analyzed: yadi bhante naḥ imam yā eva nāma rūpam paṭisandahati nanu saḥ muttaḥ bhavissati pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “yadi na paṭisandaheyya, mutto bhaveyya pāpakehi kammehi.
analyzed: yadi na paṭisandaheyya muttaḥ bhaveyya pāpakehi kammehi

original: Yasmā ca kho, mahārāja, paṭisandahati, tasmā na mutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: yasmai ca kho mahā rāja paṭisandahati tasmai na muttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso aññatarassa purisassa ambaṁ avahareyya, tamenaṁ
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ aññatarassa purisassa ambam avahareyya tamena

original: ambasāmiko gahetvā rañño dasseyya ‘iminā, deva, purisena mayhaṁ ambā avahaṭā’ti,
analyzed: amba sāmikaḥ gahetvā raññaḥ dasseyya iminā deva purisena mayham ambā avahaṭā ti

original: so evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, deva, imassa ambe avaharāmi, aññe te ambā, ye iminā ropitā,
analyzed: saḥ evam vadeyya na aha deva imassa ambe avaharāmi aññe te ambā ye iminā ropitā

original: aññe te ambā, ye mayā avahaṭā, nāhaṁ daṇḍappatto’ti.
analyzed: aññe te ambā ye mayā avahaṭā na aham daṇḍa ppatto ti

original: Kiṁ nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya iti

original: “Āma, bhante, daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Kena kāraṇenā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena ati

original: “Kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya, purimaṁ, bhante, ambaṁ appaccakkhāya pacchimena ambena so puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya purima bhante ambam appaccakkhāya pacchimena ambena so purisaḥ daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, iminā nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, tena kammena aññaṁ nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahati, tasmā na mutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja iminā nāma rūpena kammam karoti sobhanam vā pāpakam vā tena kammena aññam nāma rūpam paṭisandahati tasmā na muttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso aññatarassa purisassa sāliṁ avahareyya …pe…
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ aññatarassa purisassa sālim avahareyya pe

original: ucchuṁ avahareyya …pe…
analyzed: ucchum avahareyya pe

original: yathā, mahārāja, koci puriso hemantakāle aggiṁ jāletvā visibbetvā avijjhāpetvā pakkameyya,
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja koci purisaḥ hemanta kāle aggim jāletvā visibbetvā a vijjhāpetvā pakkameyya

original: atha kho so aggi aññatarassa purisassa khettaṁ ḍaheyya, tamenaṁ khettasāmiko gahetvā
analyzed: atha kho so aggi aññatarassa purisassa khettam ḍaheyya tam enam khetta sāmikaḥ gahetvā

original: rañño dasseyya ‘iminā, deva, purisena mayhaṁ khettaṁ daḍḍhan’ti.
analyzed: raññaḥ dasseyya iminā deva purisena mayham khettam daḍḍhanti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, deva, imassa khettaṁ jhāpemi, añño so aggi, yo mayā avijjhāpito, añño so aggi, yenimassa khettaṁ daḍḍhaṁ, nāhaṁ daṇḍappatto’ti.
analyzed: saḥ evam vadeyya na aha deva imassa khettam jhāpemi aññaḥ saḥ aggi yaḥ mayā a vijjhāpito aññaḥ saḥ aggi yena imassa khettam daḍḍha na aham daṇḍa ppatto ti

original: Kiṁ nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya iti

original: “Āma, bhante, daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Kena kāraṇenā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena ati

original: “Kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya, purimaṁ, bhante, aggiṁ appaccakkhāya pacchimena agginā so puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya purima bhante aggim appaccakkhāya pacchimena agginā so purisaḥ daṇḍa ppattaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, iminā nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, tena kammena aññaṁ nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahati, tasmā na mutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja iminā nāma rūpena kammam karoti sobhanam vā pāpakam vā tena kammena aññam nāma rūpam paṭisandahati tasmā na muttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso padīpaṁ ādāya pāsādaṁ abhirūhitvā bhuñjeyya, padīpo
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ padīpam ādāya pāsādam abhirūhitvā bhuñjeyya padīpaḥ

original: jhāyamāno tiṇaṁ jhāpeyya, tiṇaṁ jhāyamānaṁ gharaṁ jhāpeyya, gharaṁ jhāyamānaṁ gāmaṁ
analyzed: jhāyamānaḥ tiṇam jhāpeyya tiṇam jhāyamānam gharam jhāpeyya gharam jhāyamānam gāma

original: jhāpeyya, gāmajano taṁ purisaṁ gahetvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘kissa tvaṁ, bho purisa, gāmaṁ
analyzed: jhāpeyya gāma janaḥ tam purisam gahetvā evam vadeyya kissa bho purisa gāma

original: jhāpesī’ti, so evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, bho, gāmaṁ jhāpemi, añño so padīpaggi, yassāhaṁ
analyzed: jhāpesi iti saḥ evam vadeyya na aha bho gāmam jhāpemi añño so yassa āha

original: ālokena bhuñjiṁ, añño so aggi, yena gāmo jhāpito’ti, te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyuṁ,
analyzed: ālokena bhuñji aññaḥ saḥ aggi yena gāmaḥ jhāpitaḥ iti te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyu

original: kassa tvaṁ, mahārāja, aṭṭaṁ dhāreyyāsī”ti?
analyzed: kassa tva mahā rāja aṭṭam dhāreyyāsi iti

original: “Gāmajanassa, bhante”ti.
analyzed: gāma janassa bhante iti

original: “Kiṁ kāraṇā”ti?
analyzed: kim

original: “Kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya, api ca tato eva so aggi nibbatto”ti.
analyzed: kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya api ca tatas eva saḥ aggi nibbatto ti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kiñcāpi aññaṁ māraṇantikaṁ nāmarūpaṁ, aññaṁ paṭisandhismiṁ nāmarūpaṁ, api ca tatoyeva taṁ nibbattaṁ, tasmā na mutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kiñca api aññam māraṇa antikam nāma rūpa aññam paṭisandhismim nāma rūpa api ca tatas yeva tam nibbatta tasmā na muttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso dahariṁ dārikaṁ vāretvā suṅkaṁ datvā pakkameyya.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kaścid eva purisaḥ daharim dārikam vāretvā suṅkam datvā pakkameyya

original: Sā aparena samayena mahatī assa vayappattā, tato añño puriso suṅkaṁ datvā vivāhaṁ kareyya, itaro āgantvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘kissa pana me tvaṁ, ambho purisa, bhariyaṁ nesī’ti?
analyzed: sā aparena samayena mahatī assa vaya ppattā tatas aññaḥ purisaḥ suṅkam da tvā vivāham kareyya itaraḥ āgantvā evam vadeyya kissa pana me tva ambho purisa bhariyam nesi iti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ tava bhariyaṁ nemi, aññā sā dārikā daharī taruṇī, yā tayā
analyzed: saḥ evam vadeyya na aham tava bhariyam nemi aññā sā dārikā daharī taruṇī yā tayā

original: vāritā ca dinnasuṅkā ca, aññāyaṁ dārikā mahatī vayappattā mayā vāritā ca dinnasuṅkā
analyzed: vāritā ca dinna suṅkā ca aññāyam dārikā mahatī vaya ppattā mayā vāritā ca dinna suṅkā

original: cā’ti, te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyuṁ.
analyzed: ca ati te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyu

original: Kassa tvaṁ, mahārāja, aṭṭaṁ dhāreyyāsī”ti?
analyzed: kassa tva mahā rāja aṭṭam dhāreyyāsi iti

original: “Purimassa, bhante”ti.
analyzed: purimassa bhante iti

original: “Kiṁ kāraṇā”ti?
analyzed: kim

original: “Kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya, api ca tatoyeva sā mahatī nibbattā”ti.
analyzed: kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya api ca tatoyā iva sā mahatī nibbattā ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kiñcāpi aññaṁ māraṇantikaṁ nāmarūpaṁ, aññaṁ paṭisandhismiṁ nāmarūpaṁ, api ca tatoyeva taṁ nibbattaṁ, tasmā naparimutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kiñca api aññam māraṇa antikam nāma rūpa aññam paṭisandhismim nāma rūpa api ca tatas yeva tat nibbatta tasmā na parimuttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso gopālakassa hatthato khīraghaṭaṁ kiṇitvā tasseva hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkameyya ‘sve gahetvā gamissāmī’ti, taṁ aparajju dadhi sampajjeyya.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ gopālakassa hatthataḥ khīra ghaṭam kiṇitvā tassa iva hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkameyya sve gahetvā gamissāmi iti tam aparajju dadhi sampajjeyya

original: So āgantvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘dehi me khīraghaṭan’ti.
analyzed: āgantvā evam vadeyya dehi me khīra ghaṭanti

original: So dadhiṁ dasseyya.
analyzed: saḥ dadhim dasseyya

original: Itaro evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ tava hatthato dadhiṁ kiṇāmi, dehi me khīraghaṭan’ti.
analyzed: itaraḥ evam vadeyya na aham tava hatthataḥ dadhim kiṇāmi dehi me khīra ghaṭanti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘ajānato te khīraṁ dadhibhūtan’ti te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyuṁ, kassa tvaṁ, mahārāja, aṭṭaṁ dhāreyyāsī”ti?
analyzed: saḥ evam vadeyya a jānataḥ te khīram dadhi bhūtanti te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyu kassa tva mahā rāja aṭṭam dhāreyyāsi iti

original: “Gopālakassa, bhante”ti.
analyzed: gopālakassa bhante ti

original: “Kiṁ kāraṇā”ti?
analyzed: kim

original: “Kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya, api ca tato yeva taṁ nibbattan”ti.
analyzed: kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya api ca tatas yā iva tam nibbattanti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kiñcāpi aññaṁ māraṇantikaṁ nāmarūpaṁ, aññaṁ paṭisandhismiṁ nāmarūpaṁ, api ca tato yeva taṁ nibbattaṁ, tasmā na parimutto pāpakehi kammehī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kiñca api aññam māraṇa antikam nāma rūpa aññam paṭisandhismim nāma rūpa api ca tatas yā iva tat nibbatta tasmā na parimuttaḥ pāpakehi kammehi iti

original: “Kallosi, bhante nāgasenā”ti.
analyzed: kallosi bhante nāgasena ati

original: Nāmarūpaekattanānattapañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: nāma rūpa ekatta nānatta pañhaḥ chaṭṭhaḥ
